data.text: Yuba yi a yabi, a naxa,
“Ɛ luma n ɲaxankatɛ
Ɛ bata n konbi
Hali n bata tantan,
Xa ɛ ɛ yɛtɛ yite n xili ma,
nayi, ɛ xa a kolon
Xa n gbelegbele tɔrɔni ito bun,
Ala bata kiraan suxu n yɛɛ ra,
A bata n ma binyen ba n yi,
A bata n kala yiren birin yi,
A bata xɔlɔ n xili ma han,
A yɛngɛsone bata e malan,
“A bata ngaxakedenne masiga n na,
N kon kaane bata n nabeɲin,
N ma muxune
N na n ma walikɛɛn xilima,
N ma ɲaxanla mi fa tinɲɛ n dɛɛn xirin ma,
Hali dii ɲɔrɛne,
N naɲaxu n xɔyi kɛndɛne birin ma,
N bata doyen,
N xɔyine,
Nanfera ɛ n sagatanma alo Ala?
“N yi waxi a xɔn ma nun
e yi sɛbɛ yɔxɔ lefaan ma wure ɲɔɛ ralemunxin na,
N na a kolon
Hali n fati kidin birin na kun fureni,
N na a toma nɛn,
Ɛ a falama, ɛ naxa,
Anu, ɛ yi lan nɛn,
